summon_storm.comment: Duration is hardcoded to 60 seconds (1 minute) in RaevyxSummonStormAbility.java

hints.taming_chance_base: Lower is easier: 1 = 100% per feed, 100 = 1% per feed
hints.taming_chance_hearty: Lower is easier: 1 = 100% per feed, 100 = 1% per feed
hints.taming_chance: Lower is easier: 1 = 100% per attempt, 100 = 1% per attempt
hints.legacy_taming: true = simple food taming, false = special mechanics (rodeo/low-health)
